metadata.title: Great King of the Deep, I Humbly Seek to Crush You

tracks.text: Sunraku's muscular body, covered in the scars of Lycagon's mark, walks across an expanse under the night sky and nearly full moon.
Debris floats
Backdropped by lightning, text reads, Shangri-La Frontier
Ink sketch of Sunraku's face. The ink splatters, and Emul falls through it. Sunraku catches her, and she crawls onto his shoulder. Behind him is a picture of Rakuro
Pencilgon smiles at us. Behind her is a picture of Towa Amane.
Katzo's hands burn with fire. Behind her is Kei Uomi.
Psyger strikes the grown with the purple long sword Antinomy.
A nest of interlocking lines forms. Ceecrue, a white rabbit samurai, leaps across them.
Outstretched hands form a diamond. Akitsu Akane's face smiles in the gap.
Rust holds a bow and Mold holds a staff.
Chains wrap around Sunraku's legs
Rakuro reaches up a hand. A hand reaches towards the metal spine in the ruins of past glories.
Psyger-0, Sunraku, Katzo, and Pencilgon stand side by side.
The chains shatter.
In red, fishmen wield swords and race towards the party in a circle.
The fishmen charge Stude at the wheel of the ship.
A mermaid fights Araba.
C'tarnid's giant tentacles wrap around the Crying Innsman
A girl with blue eyes and white hair dances. Star Rain, Sylvia Goldberg. She falls into the floor, the floor rotates, and a white super hero replaces her. Galaxia Series, The Metius
Megumi turns into Yggdryad. Nitro Squad.
In front of her stands Ranzo and Armed Lava.
The Atlanticus Lepnorca swims, its face engulfed with fire. It approaches an expanse with floating debris. Sunraku walks.
Lightning crackles across the orca. It opens its mouth, showing teeth. Darkness.
The orca swims just above the rooftops of R'lyath
The orca lowers, close to the ground
Its fins glow and crackle

The orca opens its mouth and fires a beam. For a second, the world goes black and white. An energy orb shoots down the street, shattering houses in its wake. Sunraku disappears in a brilliant light. The strike flies half a mile through the city. From behind the tower, light and rubble explode in all directions. From a distance, light and destruction ripples across the city.
Fade to white
Text, 49, Great King of the Deep, I Humbly Seek to Crush You
He crashes and rolls across the floor of the Inventoria
HP 4 of 80
He chugs a potion
Full health
He exits the Inventoria and lands in R'lyath
The tower is untouched.
shadow
The orca, only feet away. He dodges.
It rises
The orca opens its mouth wide
Darkness
The orca roots around in the trail of destroyed buildings. Sunraku watches from high above.
He stares.
The orca follows them. Sunraku eyes destroyed buildings.
Orca chomps
Sunraku falls.
Araba catches him
Orca smashes through a building
Flashback, Araba swims behind the tower as light hits it
Araba lets go
Buffs, Gravity Zero, Shana-Oh Incarnate, Fleet Foot
Sunraku bounces off a magic circle, a building, a roof, and a boulder
He arcs over a roof. He looks back at the orca's wide, open mouth, ringed with pointy teeth
Cartoon, Sunraku runs from Orca and vanishes. Orca thinks, Disappeared!? I'll keep searching the area where it was
He exhales
The orca attacks the ground
The decoy flickers out
Orca looks up at Araba
Araba swims, orca close behind
Sunraku appears in an alley
He leaps over an entrance and notices a feminine creature through a window
He reaches a platform
The orca eyes Sunraku
The orca passes Araba
The orca's blue, crystalline tail crackles
The blast fires
The energy flies towards the tower, lightning trailing behind
Sunraku lifts his wrist, shielding his face
In a flash of brilliant light, the energy hits the tower
Nearby, Araba shields his face
The beam reflects and strikes the orca in the neck
The orca falls, red pixels and bubbles drifting from its body, its eyes dim
It crashes to the city
Sunraku reappears on the Tower platform
He equips Ducsuram
He strikes the orca's scaly hide and bounces off
He equips Gilta Brill
He rapidly punches the orca in the face.
Veins throb across Sunraku's head, neck, and beak. Araba watches with concern.
He recoils from flames
Using Shana-Oh, he leaps in the air
He punches the orca's forehead. Ribbons of light and ancient runes expand from the impact. Orca pushes him back
Araba catches Sunraku, and they drop to the ground.
The orca flickers
Its flickering fin crackles
Explosion
Waves of blue flame roll across buildings
The orca lies in rubble, flickering and burning
Smoke and steam drift off a giant crystal. Araba and Sunraku contort to hide behind it.
The orca dissipates explosively
The sun rises over the hotel
Stude, Ceecrue, and Emul sleep in the safe house bed
Akitsu available Day 2, 6, and 7. Rust/Mold, 3, 5, 7
Text, Day 2 end. 5 days until X-Day
Pixel art title card. Blue text over a starry background spell Shangri-La Frontier
Sunraku holds Ducsuram and stands in Ruluiath.
Pencilgon holds a golden spear and stands in the hidden garden
Katzo holds up fists and stands by the Teardrop lake
Psyger crosses her arms and stands in the Lightless Barrens
Montage of the game store, the Utopia headquarters, the palace, Rabbituza, a tower, and Fifticia.
Sunraku runs across Ruluiath, an underwater city. Fish swim in the air. Seaweed lines the street.
Katzo runs across the cave floor on the shores of the Teardrop lake
A serpent emerges from the lake. Crab pincers snap.
Montage of items. Log. Bow. Twin blue blades. Grimoire. Mana potion. Cards.
Pencilgon runs across the hidden garden. Red spider lilies blow in the breeze, surrounded by cavernous walls, under a full moon.
Ceecrue, Rust, Sunraku, Akane, Mold, and Psyger walk along a dock. A crescent moon shines over the sea.
The Scarlet Whale floats at sea. A giant octopus leg reaches up.
Rakuro, Towa, Kei, and Megumi walk along an urban street. Cars drive by.
Montage. The Sage of Awakening. Akane's fox mask. Psyger in a yellow demon mask. Ranzo, the old samurai. The beetle helm. A gas mask.
Blue text over a black background spells Shangri-La Frontier
